channel.title: Docs on We Ignite Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on We Ignite Tech

item.title: Program overview
item.description: Kick off! The program starts with a particuliar session as known as kick-off. The kick-off will be an event in itself. The practical details of your venue and attendees will be available here During this session we will set up your developper’s environment or check it out if you already finished with it (ref install your dev environment) We will present all the tools we will use to work together on site and online

item.title: Getting ready
item.description: Some reading Hi there and welcome to kube - my two theme for the static site generator hugo. kube is open source and can be found on kube. This article is just a demo post and shows you the style of common used elements. Bear claw danish chocolate lollipop souffl√© jelly. Apple pie chocolate cake jelly-o icing bonbon. Gingerbread pastry fruitcake muffin chocolate bar cheesecake. Sugar plum bonbon bonbon lemon drops gummies.
